item.description:
We will be getting together on the 19th for our 6th social night. I have made reservations at the Ixtapa Mexican Restaurant in Lunenburg.

As always, Please only RSVP YES if you are POSITIVE you can attend. I can't set this up for maybes because it is a fixed number group. We understand dropouts are unavoidable sometimes, but your YES could keep someone who could go from knowing that it's a possibility. Thanks!

Again, and for newbies, most restaurants will not split the check for large parties so please bring cash! Changes will be posted.

-Chris
item.name: Atheist Meetup Dinner & Drinks 6
